extendedInfo.description: Interesting quotes is a free application that contains around 3000 of the best quotes by famous people. The application features the following:- An easy to use interface (use the buttons on the bottom of the screen to browse through the quotes)- Possibility to view random quotes or move back and forth between them- A number of different colored backgrounds to chose from- Possibility to mark your favorite quotes and browse through them- Possibility to send any quote by email, SMS, or any other service available on your mobile phone- Works in portrait and landscape modeThe application includes quotes by famous people such as actors, authors, poets, scientists, politicians, the Bible and much more.

reviews.comment: I liked it but too many misspellings so cannot trust sources either. Had to uninstall. :(
reviews.author: A Google User
